  • All Classes

Package com.team08storyapp

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Annotation
    Annotation is a model class representing a reader's Annotations on a Particular Story Fragment.
    AnnotationAdapter
    AnnotationAdapter is a customized ArrayAdapter that is designed for populating the images and text (if applicable) into right views in a ListView.
    AnnotationAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder is a like a struct in C++.
    AnnotationController
    AnnotationController is a controller class that is responsible for resizing (if needed), saving annotations and update the current story and current story fragment.
    AnnotationViewActivity
    AnnotationViewActivity is a view class that displays a list of annotations for a specific story fragment.
    Audio
    +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++++++ This class is used for future implementations (Fake Class)++++++ +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Audio is a model class representing an soundtrack or recording that can be used in an Annotation on a StoryFragment in a Story or as an illustration on a StoryFragment in a Story.
    BuiltInHelp
    BuiltInHelp provides a pop up dialog to display help on the user interface for the screen the user is currently on.
    Choice
    Choice is a model for the possible choices a Story Fragment may contain.
    ChoiceAdapter
    ChoiceAdapter is a customized ArrayAdapter, which will populate only selected information of a list of Choice objects into a listView by overriding the getView method.
    ChoiceAdapter.ViewHolder  
    Decoder  
    EditChoiceActivity
    EditChoiceActivity is a view class that provides author an opportunity to edit the new choice's text and the fragment it links to.
    EditFragmentActivity
    EditFragmentActivity is a view class that provides author an EditText to edit story text for the current story fragment, a gallery to add illustrations, and a listview to add choices.
    ElasticSearchResponse<T>
    ElasticSearchResponse is a model class used in the ESHelper class for retrieving a known object form the webservice.
    ElasticSearchSearchResponse<T>
    ElasticSearchSearchResponse is a model class used in the ESHelper class when retrieving search results from searching the webservice for particular data.
    Encoder  
    ESHelper
    ESHelper is a helper class that helps the application communicate with a webservice.
    FileHelper
    FileHelper is a helper class that mainly manages retrieving, saving stories or images files in local, sometimes assists ESHelper by encoding or decoding a story when uploading or downloading a story
    Hits<T>
    Hits is a model class used in conjunction with the ElasticSearch in the ESHelper class.
    InternetDetector
    InternetDetector is a singleton class that mainly checks the connectivity of the network.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity is a view class that displays the main menu for our application.
    MultimediaController
    +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++++++ This class is used for future implementations (Fake Class)++++++ +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ MultimediaController is a controller class that is responsible for resizing (if needed), saving multimedia and update the current story and current story fragment.
    MyStoriesActivity
    MyStoriesActivity is a view class that displays a list of stories created by the user.
    NetworkChangeReceiver
    NetworkChangeReceiver is a BroadcastReceiver that is responsible for detecting the network state change of the device, registered in manifest.
    NewStoryActivity
    NewStoryActivity is a view class that is activated when the author needs to create a new story.
    NotificationHelper
    NotifictionHelper class helps create a notification in status bar when UpdateTask performs sync in background.
    OfflineStoriesActivity
    OfflineStoriesActivity is a view class that displays a list of stories that have been downloaded.
    OnlineStoriesActivity
    OnlineStoriesActivity is a view class that displays a list of stories that are available online.
    Photo
    Photo is a model class representing an image or illustration that can be used in an Annotation on a Story Fragment in a Story or as an illustration on a Story Fragment in a Story.
    PhotoController
    PhotoController is a controller class that is responsible for resizing (if needed), saving illustrations and update the current story and current story fragment.
    PicAdapter
    PicAdapter is a customized Adapter based on BaseAdapter
    SelectFragmentActivity
    SelectFragmentActivity is a view class that displays a list of fragments that can be selected as results for a choice.
    Story
    Story is a model class representing a Chose Your Own Adventure Story.
    StoryController
    StoryController is a controller class that manipulates data of story objects.
    StoryFragment
    StoryFragment is a model class representing the pages of a Chose Your Own Adventure Story.
    StoryFragmentActivity
    StoryFragmentActivity is a view class that displays a specific fragment of either and online or downloaded story.
    StoryFragmentAdapter
    StoryFragmentAdapter is a customized ArrayAdapter that is designed for populating the images and text (if applicable) into right views in a ListView.
    StoryFragmentAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder is a like a struct in C++.
    StoryFragmentListActivity
    StoryFragmentListActivity is a view class that displays a list of fragments for a given story.
    StoryInfoAdapter
    This StoryInfoAdapter class is a subclass of ArrayAdapter.
    StoryInfoAdapter.ViewHolder
    This innerclass ViewHolder holds two TextViews.
    SyncManager
    SyncManager is a singleton class that handles the sync of changes on locally authored stories.
    UpdateFileRecorder
    UpdateFileRecorder is a class that records, retrieves, clears the ids of files that need to be uploaded.
    UpdateTask
    UpdateTask is an AsyncTask Object that performs sync function in the background.
    UpdateToolPackage
    UpdateToolPackage is a class that mainly works as a parameter object.
    Video
    +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++++++ This class is used for future implementations (Fake Class)++++++ +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ Video is a model class representing an soundtrack or recording that can be used in an Annotation on a StoryFragment in a Story or as an illustration on a StoryFragment in a Story.
